item.title: THE RAGE TOPIC
item.dc:creator: Juan_Regular
item.description:
Is it so unbelievable difficult to use a fucking key card? Put it in the lock, pull it out and open the door. Everybody always leaves the thing in the slot and I have to walk up two floors to explain it to them.
And for crying out loud, don´t come to me complaining that there´s no power in the rooms if you´re using camping equipment to cook inside them after I explicitly told you you´re not allowed to do that. Our fuses don´t like that shit! And neither does our insurance!

Read full topic

item.title: THE RAGE TOPIC
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Looking for a job is getting boring now. Someone just hire me!
Every single CV I sent out is individually made because every job I apply for seems to require a specific skill set. It’s just annoying having to rewrite my CV 5 times a day.

Alas, I am overqualified for most jobs and under experienced for the ones I really want. But hey, that’s life.

A guy in the job centre was complaining that he had been rejected for a job because they considered him over experienced. He had 5 years prior experience in the exact same job, but they refused him because they were worried that he’d want a real wage (rather than the substandard shit they were offering)

Read full topic

item.title: THE RAGE TOPIC
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Oh, I fucking love writing code on paper!!!

Those are my favorite college memories, knowing my prof would have to run my code in his head.
Curiously, I think I got an A in every class where I was asked to write code on paper…

item.title: THE RAGE TOPIC

item.description:
Bloodshot:

Stupid Java professor MAKING US WRITE ESSAYS ABOUT ARTICLES and making us research and write a mini-paper about a programming language we want to learn instead of actually learning Java FUCK YOU. FUCK. YOU.

For the AP exam in my Java programming class we had to write programs by hand onto a sheet of paper. If you guys have to do that, have fun with that.

item.title: THE RAGE TOPIC
item.dc:creator: Zen609
item.description:
Zuul:

I wroyr a huge number of lines. BUY I took a look around…and realized, the mods would never allow any political thought that cdidn’t complie with the lying leftwing media. That is all. Thanks and see you when the Bugs come pouring in

I guarantee that no mod is going to take any action whatsoever against you for expressing your political opinions.

The exception to that would be someone expressing racism as a political opinion. Racism won’t be tolerated. Other than that, no moderator will take action against any user for having a differing political opinion if it is expressed without violating rules regarding forum conduct - no flaming, name-calling, general personal abuse, racism, etc.

If a user feels that a moderator has abused their authority in some way, in this case taking action or threatening to take action against a user for expressing a legitimate and reasonably expressed opinion simply because it differs from that of the moderator - then the user should use the report button to report the incident.

Read full topic
